sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import './productpage.css' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import FetchApi from '../../fetchApi/FetchApi' import { addProductToCart, removeProductFromCart } from '../../../features/cartSlice' import { Box } from '@mui/material' const ProductPage = () => { const params = useParams() const id = params.product const [imgSrc, setImgSrc] = useState() const [product, setProduct] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { FetchApi(`http://localhost:4000/products/${id}` , 'GET') .then(response => { setProduct(response) setImgSrc(response.productImages[0]) } ) },[]) const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(product) console.log(id) if(!product) return 'loading' const {productName, productVersion, productDescription, productPrice, productImages} = product return (
{productImages.map((src, index) => setImgSrc(src)} > )} {/*
*/}

{productName}

{productVersion}

{productDescription}

{`${productPrice}/- Rs`}
{!product.qty || product.qty === 0 ? : null} {/* */}
) } export default ProductPage
